title: First Marriage Then Love 2 - Novel Updates
tags: Adultery   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Businessmen   Couple Growth   Doting Parents   Handsome Male Lead
author: Mo Ying   莫萦
description:
Being in a relationship with Cheng Xiang for 10 years, Lin Li thought she will finally has her happy ending. But after he left her on the altar during their wedding day, Lin Li stopped believing in love anymore. 

Zhou Han betrayed his families and bestfriends just to give all of his love for his childhood sweetheart, Ling Ran, before she ruthlessly betrayed him in the end.

To save their bestfriend, Su Yicheng and Gu Anran, both of them decided to fake a “relationship” before ended up getting a marriage certificate. Will they be able to fall in love again?>
